metadata.title: CVE-2023-2941 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to114.0.5735.90 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to spoof the contents of the UI via a crafted ChromeExtension. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
